---
title: "Settings file"
---
The model settings are configured in a *settings.toml* file. The configuration file consists of important core information and can be extended with a range of optional input, see @tbl-toml:

::: {.callout-note}
File paths in the settings can be relative to the settings.toml file or absolute.
:::

| Field                        | Description                                                                                                   | Required                            | Example                                  |
|------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------|------------------------------------------|
| **[global]**                 |                                                                                                               |                                     |                                          |
| crs                          | Projection                                                                                                    | No                                  | 'EPSG:32617'                             |
| gdal_cache                   | Set the GDAL cache in megabytes to restrict the footprint of GDAL                                             | No                                  | 10                                       |
| keep_temp_files              | True/False                                                                                                    | No                                  | False                                    |
| thread                       | Set the number of threads of the calculations                                                                 | No                                  | 4                                        |
| **[global grid]**            |                                                                                                               |                                     |                                          |
| chunk                        | Set grid chunk size                                                                                           | No                                  | [1024, 1014]                             |
| **[output]**                 |                                                                                                               |                                     |                                          |
| path                         | Set directory path to save the output                                                                         | Yes                                 | 'output'                                 |
| **[output.csv]**             |                                                                                                               |                                     |                                          |
| name                         | File name of the output csv                                                                                   | Yes                                 | 'output.csv'                             |
| **[output.geom]**            |                                                                                                               |                                     |                                          |
| name1                        | File name of the output vector data                                                                           | Yes                                 | 'spatial.gpkg'                           |
| **[output.grid]**            |                                                                                                               | optional                            |                                          |
| name                         | File name for the output for the grid model; WARN: not fully implemented yet                                  | Yes, if working with grid           | 'output.nc'                              |
| **[hazard]**                 |                                                                                                               |                                     |                                          |
| file                         | Path to hazard file (raster or netCDF). Can contain one (for events) or multiple (for return periods) bands   | Yes                                 | 'hazard/event_map.nc'                    |
| crs                          | Projection of hazard data                                                                                     | Yes, if crs is unknown in dataset   | 'EPSG:32617'                             |
| elevation_reference          | DEM or Datum for a water depth or water elevation map                                                         | Yes                                 | 'dem'                                    |
| risk                         | True/False If true, risk (EAD) is calculated                                                                  | Yes                                 | True                                     |
| return_periods               | return periods for hazard calculation when they cannot be inferred from the data itself                       | No                                  | [2, 5, 10, 25]                           |
| **[hazard.settings]**        |                                                                                                               |                                     |                                          |
| chunk                        | Set chunk size (Advise to use the setting under global.grid)                                                  | No                                  | [1024, 1014]                             |
| subset                       | Specific layer from a multilayered netCDF file (GDAL can't read those properly)                               | No                                  | 'zs'                                     |
| var_as_band                  | True/False Read netCDF subdatasets as raster bands                                                            | No                                  | False                                    |
| **[exposure.geom]**          |                                                                                                               |                                     |                                          |
| csv                          | All additional info for the vector data                                                                       | Yes                                 | 'exposure/exposure.csv'                  |
| file1                        | File path of exposure vector file with Object ID column to enable linking exposure.csv output to vector file. | Yes                                 | 'exposure/buildings.gpkg'                |
| crs                          | Projection of exposure data                                                                                   | Yes, if crs is unknown in dataset   | 'EPSG:32617'                             |
| index                        | Set index column of the data                                                                                  | Yes                                 | 'Object ID'                              |
| **[exposure.grid]**          |                                                                                                               |                                     |                                          |
| file                         |                                                                                                               | Yes, if netCDF is provided as input | 'exposure/raster.nc'                     |
| crs                          | Output projection                                                                                             | Yes, if crs is unknown in dataset   | 'EPSG:32617'                             |
| **[exposure.grid.settings]** |                                                                                                               |                                     |                                          |
| chunk                        | Set chunk size (Advise to use the setting under global.grid)                                                  | No                                  | [1024, 1014]                             |
| var_as_band                  | True/False Read netCDF subdatasets as raster bands                                                            | No                                  | True                                     |
| **[vulnerability]**          |                                                                                                               |                                     |                                          |
| file                         | Damage functions for impact assessment                                                                        | Yes                                 | 'vulnerability/vulnerability_curves.csv' |
| step_size                    | Interpolation scale for the vulnerability curves                                                              | No                                  | 0.01                                     |
: Settings.toml input (required and optional fields) {#tbl-toml .striped .hover .column-page-inset-right}

Below an example of what a *settings.toml* could look like considering required fields only:

***Mini settings.toml** (soley required fields):*
```html
[output]
path = "output"

[output.csv]
name = "output.csv"

[output.geom]
name1 = "spatial.gpkg"

[hazard]
file = "hazard/SL_10yr_reprojected.tif"
crs = "EPSG:4326"
elevation_reference = "DEM"
risk = false

[exposure.geom]
csv = "./exposure/exposure.csv"
crs = "EPSG:4326"
file1 = "./exposure/buildings.gpkg"

[vulnerability]
file = "./vulnerability/vulnerability_curves.csv"

```
